About Me

I started DJing in the 80s and have remained a true vinyl enthusiast ever since. I bought my turntables and records brand new back in the day, and they still serve me well today. You can catch me playing at The Buccaneer from time to time, as well as at private events.

If you seek a time-tested DJ, look to me. I offer a wide range of genres, including 80s hip-hop, funk, New Wave, and freestyle. Check out my Spotify playlists below for a taste of my usual tracks. I also have some non-80s mixes on Soundcloud, so check those out as well!

If you want to book me as your vinyl turntable DJ for your next event, just get in touch. I'm always happy to share my passion for music with others and create an unforgettable experience for everyone involved!
